name: Killer Chambers
description: Help Brave Lord survive the Killer Chambers and defeat the bosses summoned by Lord Grave! Quick reflexes and good memory are the keys to success in this unforgiving action-platformer. Can you clear all 5 floors and get the King's Crown?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11
